actions.name: Carmine Reins

cost.trigger: The target resolves an Ability or Attack on the user.

actions.description:
Trigger: The target resolves an Ability or Attack on the user.
Effect: The user loses -1 ATK and SPATK stage for 7 Activations.,then, the target is Suppressed 5, Hindered 5, and has loses -1 ATK, SPATK, SPD, and EVA stages for 5 activations. The user can alternatively use this Ability as a Complex Action during one of its Activations, spending 12 PP at a range of 50m. The user gains 2 Stacks of Weary. Then, the target is Bound 9. While Bound, the target is Lifted, Suppressed, Hindered, Nullified, and has its default ATK, DEF, SPATK, SPDEF, SPD, and ACC stages decreased by -2.
